dialog.title: Important
dialog.description: Please do not leave the article page until you have finished. You have access to the content for 3 hours. To re-access the content you will have to repeat the payment.

successModal.title: Submitted Successfully!
successModal.description: Thank you for your submission! You can check your submission by clicking on

submitModal.title: Check & Submit your answers
submitModal.something: Click off the popup window to return to the crossword.

dialog.message: IF ON MOBILE - SWIPE AT THE BOTTOM OF YOUR SCREEN TO MAKE THE SUBMIT APPEAR. Please do not leave the page until you have submitted your crossword answers. Unlimited time, 1 entry per wallet. To re-access the game you will have to repeat the payment with a DMND. The clues are separated into Down and Across. Clicking on a specific clue will automatically set you up to enter your answer for that clue.You can submit your answers with the Submit button in the bottom right, which will make a popup appear. Here you can do a final check on your answers and then confirm submission. Submission is complete when your transaction with your submission is confirmed - a popup will appear when the submission is complete confirming things. The reset button will clear all your answers.

notFound.message: Sorry, this page does not exist
